title: Chagossian First Minister vows to bring MORE people to islands after being threatened with removal: 'They'll have to kill me!'
tags: Labour MP sparks fiery GB News row after claiming Chagossians are 'in favour' of deal;Donald Trump is 'beginning to smell a rat' with Keir Starmer's 'dodgy' Chagos deal, top Tory warns;Keir Starmer lied to Donald Trump over 'nonsense' Chagos 'surrender' deal, ex-Tory leader claims;The GB News Editorial Charter
